overview automations: Create and manage automated workflows to streamline property management tasks.
explore automation templates: Explore our collection of ready-to-use automation templates.
ready to use templates: Ready-to-use templates to get you started quickly.
no templates found: No automation templates found. Check back later for new additions!
request custom automation: Can't find what you need? Request a custom automation tailored to your specific needs.
describe your needs: Describe your automation needs, and our team will create it for you.
describe automation: Describe the automation you need (e.g., 'When a new tenant signs a lease, send a welcome email and create a task to update the unit status').
build test automations: Build and test your own custom automations in a flexible sandbox environment.
drag drop blocks: Drag & drop blocks here to build your workflow (e.g., 'Trigger: New Issue' -> 'Action: Send Email').
no permission view automations: You do not have permission to view automations.
no permission create automations: You do not have permission to create automations.
automatically send an email to the assig: Automatically send an email to the assigned maintenance staff when a new critical issue is reported.
send an automated sms reminder to tenant: Send an automated SMS reminder to tenants 5 days before their rent is due.
move documents older than 1 year from th: Move documents older than 1 year from the active registry to the archive.
